objects.text:
Energy-Efficient Heat Pump Technology • Multiple Drying Cycles
• Smart Temperature Control • Family-Sized Capacity

product_details.name: Insignia™ Modern Smart Heat Pump Dryer - Energy-Efficient Fabric Care
product_details.description:
• Advanced Digital Display with LED Screen for Easy Operation
• Multiple Drying Cycles Including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty & Delicates
• Energy-Efficient Heat Pump Technology for Cost Savings
• Sleek White Design with Modern Black Glass Door
• Large Capacity Drum for Family-Sized Loads
• Smart Temperature Control with Multiple Heat Settings
• Convenient Maintenance Access Panel
• Built-in Ventilation System
• User-Friendly Control Dial with Multiple Program Options
• Compact Yet Powerful Design Perfect for Any Laundry Space
• Clear Digital Timer Display for Cycle Monitoring
• Wrinkle Prevention Feature Available
• Easy-Access Lint Filter for Simple Maintenance

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern home appliance against a soft, professional background with light blue gradient waves and subtle circular and grid overlays for visual interest. The banner features a bold main heading ("heading") in large blue typography centered at the top, immediately followed by a tagline ("tagline") in smaller dark gray font. At the center is a high-resolution product image ("product_image"), prominently displaying the dryer. Below it, a detailed feature list in compact serif font ("description") enhances informational appeal. The price ("price") is prominently displayed in bold blue, followed by a rounded rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: `#E6F4F9`
- Cool Teal: `#3D9CC7`
- Deep Ocean: `#2A7DA3`
- Charcoal: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a front-load dryer with a modern, minimalist design using a clean and cohesive color palette. Dominant colors include sleek white (#F5F5F5) for the body, creating a sense of purity and cleanliness, and deep black (#1A1A1A) for the door and control screen, providing contrast and sophistication. Accents such as the metallic dial ring and light blue (#A9C9EA), red (#E36F6F), and gray (#BDBDBD) markings on the control panel add subtle highlights for functionality and style. These colors blend gently yet stand out due to the sharpness in contrast, ideal for an ad banner emphasizing clarity, innovation, and premium quality.
